cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 200 miles SSE of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the upper Texas and southwest Louisiana coasts, then expected to arc north across Arkansas and sweep northeast through the Mississippi and Ohio Valleys
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Texas-Louisiana border between Port Arthur, TX and Cameron, LA

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane watch east of Intracoastal City to west of Morgan City, LA; storm-surge watch from the Mouth of the Mississippi River to Ocean Springs, MS, including Lake Pontchartrain/Maurepas/Borgne
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm-surge warning Freeport, TX to the Mouth of the Mississippi River; hurricane warning San Luis Pass, TX to Intracoastal City, LA; tropical-storm warning Sargent, TX to San Luis Pass, and east of Intracoastal City, LA to the Mouth of the Mississippi River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North-west Gulf Coast (Texas & Louisiana) and inland across Arkansas and the mid-Mississippi Valley
